item.title: Leapmotor Raises Full-Year Target After Sales Hit Record
item.description: Zhejiang Leapmotor Technology has lifted its full-year sales target after swinging to a first-half profit on surging demand and a ramped up push into overseas markets. Co-President Michael Wu also say

item.title: A 200% Stock Surge Makes Leapmotor China’s Next EV Rising Star
item.description: Zhejiang Leapmotor Technology Co., once a fringe player in China’s electric-vehicle industry, is beating all its startup rivals by sales and stock gains this year and analysts say there’s more to come
